title: Uploading a new addon or updating the existing addon
content:
I have published my addon on addons.mozilla, when i try to upload new version of the addon the progress bar stucks at validating filename.zip.

I have tried creating a new addon, still the progress bar stucks at validationg filenam.zip

Methods tried:

  1. Logging in again
  2. Clearing browser data and trying again
  3. Changing different browser and networks

Nothing seems to be working
creator: razoo.choudhary

title: How do I get rid of the notification count in paranthesis in tabs?
content: Is this a behavior that can be disabled in about:config?
creator: gsrgtrdg4565653

title: Window session refuses to restore after restarting laptop
content: Because one of the windows open was not responding, I restarted my laptop. When I tried to restore the previous session, nothing came up. What do I do?
creator: okoyevivian8

title: Firefox hangs in the task manager despite the fact that the browser is not running
content: After using the browser and closing it, Firefox continues to run in the background and hangs in the task manager, despite the fact that the browser is not running. We have to manually terminate processes. Strange behavior!
creator: redheat_specop

title: How to customize about:newtab (using a wallpaper)?
content:
Hello, today I wanted to replace the "about:newtab" background with a picture.

I've already tried a lot like creating an extension, and adding the chrome folder with "userChrome.css" or "userContent.css" but I haven't had any luck whatsoever.

Could you help me in any way?

My preferred way would be through an extension to share it with my friends.

I already thank you in advance! :)

Best regards, Leon
creator: leon.klier

title: Disable the 3-dot menu icon next to the address bar drop down results?
content: Looking for a solution to either completely disable this menu icon or at least stop Firefox from focusing on it when I press the tab key to navigate between results.
